name: rx-queue
description: Easy to Use Queue based on RxJS for Delay/Throttle/Debounce Edit

scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run rollup && npm run dist:es6to5
scripts.lint:ts: npm run clean && echo tslint v`tslint --version` && tslint --project tsconfig.json "{bin,examples,src,tests}/**/*.ts" --exclude "tests/fixtures/" --exclude "dist/" && tsc --noEmit
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:npm: npm run dist && export TMPDIR=/tmp/npm.package.$$ && npm pack && mkdir $TMPDIR && mv *-*.*.*.tgz $TMPDIR && cp tests/fixtures/smoke-testing.js $TMPDIR && cd $TMPDIR && npm init -y && npm i *-*.*.*.tgz rxjs brolog && node smoke-testing.js

author: Huan LI <zixia@zixia.net>
